column7: Observation Geometry w/ FOV and Distance (REQ)
column8: Calibration (eg: type of reflectance; spectralon; gold)  (REQ)

column2: Samples were collected at the Huntington Garden in San Marino; CA as part of a JPL Subcontract studying HyTES imagery. Samples were taken to JPL and processed within 48 hours of collection. The same leaves were processed in the Nicolet and then measured using the ASD.

column21: ASD measures from 0.35 - 2.5 micrometers; Nicolet measures 2.5 - 15.3869 micrometers
